text: Abellio Greater Anglia is a British train operating company that provides suburban and express passenger rail services from Liverpool Street station in the City of London to destinations in the East of England. In August 2016, it was announced that Abellio had won the franchise again until 2025. They promise to replace all its trains by 2020. Sadly this has not happened. ==References== Category:2012 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2010s establishments in England
title: Abellio Greater Anglia
